name: managebot
tagline: A lightweight Telegram bot for managing tasks and schedules
description: Managebot is a minimal self-hosted Telegram bot for managing to-do lists, schedules, and commands through chat. Itâ€™s lightweight and ideal for self-hosted bot workflows with minimal setup.

features.title: Email Notifications
features.description: Set up time-based reminders that send alerts via Telegram

features.title: Schedule Management
features.description: View and organize upcoming events and deadlines in a timeline

features.title: Team Collaboration
features.description: Allow multiple Telegram users to interact with the bot simultaneously

features.title: Search and Filter
features.description: Search and filter tasks by status, date, or category for quick access
